trigger.expression: ({iregexp(On)}=0) and ({iregexp(null)}=0 and {iregexp(no batch file yet)}=0 and {str(0)}=0)
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Indicating is powered off

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is extremely high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}<={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is extremely low at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}<={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdNonCritical,{#POWER}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is pretty low at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},ReadingCelsius,{#THERMAL}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature {#NAME} is extremely high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},ReadingCelsius,{#THERMAL}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{$IPMI}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdNonCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature {#NAME} is pretty high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
